participant_1.background:
I once pretended to be a Jedi Knight to get out of a speeding ticket.
i simply walk around when i have nothing to do.
i watch south park at least once a day.
The weather is perfect for cheering!
we have two pets as well.

participant_2.background:
My favorite music is techno, it helps me get in the zone for my workouts.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that I'm proud of who I am and who I love.
I am unmarried and I enjoy my freedom.
I spent time with my family and enjoyed the local culture.
I'm just trying to live my life and be happy.

content.text: I'm just listening to some techno music, getting ready for my workout.
Oh nice! I love techno music. It's so upbeat and it really gets me moving. What's your favorite song right now?
Right now, I'm really digging "Harder Better Faster Stronger" by Daft Punk.
Oh that's a great song! I love the beat and the vocals.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to the gym, I like to hang out with friends, and I like to watch South Park.
Oh, cool! I love South Park too. It's so funny.
Me too! It's one of my favorite shows.
So, what do you do for work?
Oh, cool! I've always been interested in computer science.
It's a lot of fun! I get to work on cool projects and I get to learn new things all the time.
That's awesome! I'm glad you like your job.
